messages.subject: ???? FOR LYNDA or anyone else :-)
messages.msgSnippet: Lynda or any one else with this experience, could you please let me know exactly how he went about doing this.  Thsi is a battle we are fixing to face next
messages.messageBody:
Lynda or any one else with this experience, could you please let me know
exactly how he went about doing this. Thsi is a battle we are fixing to
face next year. I understand that this subject is probably not welcome on
the list, so if any of you would like to email me privately your
experiences, please please do so. I don't know where to start or who to
speak with first. I am in Missouri, but any and all info would be greatly
appreciated by my "football player!" as well as myself. Thank you

KIM

<Message: 22
<Date: Fri, 22 Mar 2002 11:10:51 -0800
<From: "Lynda" <lurine@...>
<Subject: Re: Re: Unschooling or not?

<Son #3 has gone to school upon occasion. He has <done it his way and has
<even taken them all the way through all the <complaint processes to the
<school board and then flashed state regs at them. <He won and he did
school
<his way which was to go during a sports season
